query.name: GitHub Repository Search
query.query: Search my GitHub repositories for projects related to Python and machine learning, then show me the most recent commits.
query.description: Tests GitHub MCP server with complex multi-step operations

query.name: Filesystem Operations
query.query: List all Python files in the current directory, read the contents of the largest one, and summarize what it does.
query.description: Tests Filesystem MCP server with file discovery and reading

query.name: Web Search and Analysis
query.query: Search the web for the latest developments in Claude AI capabilities, and create a summary of the top 3 findings.
query.description: Tests Brave Search MCP server with web queries

query.name: Multi-Server Complex Task
query.query: Find Python files in this project using filesystem tools, search GitHub for similar projects, and search the web for best practices related to the topics you find.
query.description: Tests coordination across multiple MCP servers
